Chaz Maviyane-Davies (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1952) bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe osise nke bi na Cambridge Massachusetts, United States. Magazin Design nke United Kingdom akọwawo Maviyane-Davies dị ka “onye agha nke eserese eserese.” Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka BA na Mahadum Middlesex na MA na Central School of Art and Design, London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Britain, Japan, Malaysia, United States, na Zimbabwe.

N'ihi ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọjọọ n'ala nna ya nke Zimbabwe na ụdị esemokwu nke ọrụ ya, Maviyane-Davies kwagara United States n'afọ 2001, ebe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke imewe na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na Boston

Na mgbakwunye na e bipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, magazin mba ụwa, na akwụkwọ akụkọ, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya nke ọma ma tinye ya na ọtụtụ nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche. Ọ bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na ọtụtụ mahadum na ikpo okwu okike. N'afọ 2009, e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta dọkịnta nke akwụkwọ ozi mmadụ na Mahadum Massachusetts, Lowell

Ruo ihe karịrị iri afọ atọ, ọrụ dị ike nke Maviyane-Davies ewerewo nsogbu nke ịzụ ahịa, ahụike, nri, ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, gburugburu ebe obibi na ikike mmadụ. N'afọ ndị 1980 na afọ 1990, Maviyane-Davies rụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na Zimbabwe nke a na-akpọ The Maviyane Projects nke bụ ọkachamara na ihe nkiri na eserese eserese.
Ọ lụrụ Chiyoko ma nwee otu nwa nwanyị Djena.

O gosipụtala ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa site na ngosi ịkpọ òkù nke mpempe akwụkwọ na ihe ngosi naanị ya na China, Taiwan, South Korea, Japan, Russia, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Bulgaria, France, Ukraine, Argentina, Mexico, Brazil, England, na Netherlands n'etiti mba ndị ọzọ.
Ụwa nke ajụjụ: 120 posters on the human condition (2015)
